title: PMS 2.0 319 - NFL Week 16 Preview, Tom Pelissero, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys look ahead to this weekend's NFL games and preview a couple of them including Titans @ Packers, Colts @ Steelers, and all the other marquee games that have playoff implications. Joining the show later is NFL Network Insider, and friend of the program, Tom "The Arrow" Pelissero joins the show to update everyone on what's going on in the NFL this week, Dewey Haskins getting stripped of his C, Big Ben calling a "players only" Zoom that might have actually just been an offensive meeting, JuJu deciding to stop dancing, covid protocols changing as we approach the playoffs, and much more (27:40-51:06). We can't thank you enough for listening, we hope you have a Merry Christmas, enjoy what you can, and stay safe. We'll see you all on Monday, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
